description: The Begonia 'Dangling Pearls' is an amazing plant species that brings a magical look to any garden. Its cascading stems bear bright pink, pinkish-white and white blooms that hang in clusters like jewels, creating a stunning look. Plants can reach up to three feet in height and have glossy, wavy-edged green leaves that add extra texture and interest. Despite its exotic looks, this plant is incredibly easy to grow and perfect for containers or gardens in partial shade. The Begonia 'Dangling Pearls' is a truly unique plant that will delight and charm any gardener.
